verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* thee in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w defend|strong="H7682"\w* thee;\f + \fr 20.1 \ft defend…: Heb. set thee on an high place\f*

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* thee \w help|strong="H5828"\w* from the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and \w strengthen|strong="H5582"\w* thee out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*;\f + \fr 20.2 \ft thee help: Heb. thy help\f*\f + \fr 20.2 \ft strengthen: Heb. support\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* all thy \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w accept|strong="H1878"\w* thy burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*; \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 20.3 \ft accept: Heb. turn to ashes: or, make fat\f*
\w Grant|strong="H5414"\w* thee according to thine own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w* all thy \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*.

We will \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, and in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* we will set up \add our\add* \w banners|strong="H1713"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w* all thy \w petitions|strong="H4862"\w*.

Now \w know|strong="H3045"\w* I that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saveth|strong="H3467"\w* his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*; he will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* him from his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* with the \w saving|strong="H3468"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* of his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.\f + \fr 20.6 \ft his holy…: Heb. the heaven of his holiness\f*\f + \fr 20.6 \ft with…: Heb. by the strength of the salvation of\f*

Some \add trust\add* in \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and some in \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: but we will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
They are brought \w down|strong="H3766"\w* and \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: but we are \w risen|strong="H6965"\w*, and stand \w upright|strong="H5749"\w*.
\w Save|strong="H3467"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: let the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* us \w when|strong="H3117"\w* we \w call|strong="H7121"\w*.
